description: This file defines a RecyclerView ViewHolder class for displaying note items in an Android application. It manages references to UI components and provides a method to bind Note data to UI views.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: A RecyclerView ViewHolder subclass that manages views for a note item, binding note data to UI components.

methods.name: NoteViewHolder
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the view holder with references to the title and snippet TextViews.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Method to bind a Note object to the view holder, updating the UI components with note data.
